text: Chris Cournoyer (born July 24, 1970) is an American politician. She has been the 48th and current Lieutenant Governor of Iowa since December 2024. She replaced Adam Gregg, who resigned from the role in September 2024. Cournoyer is a member of the Republican Party. She was an Iowa state senator from 2019 to 2024. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Lieutenant Governors of Iowa Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Dallas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Chris Cournoyer
